fig.label: Figure 1

caption.p: Flowchart of this study. The following datasets were used for the identification of potential diagnostic genes and mechanisms associated with the development of sepsis: GSE13904 (children), GSE25504 (children), GSE9960 (adults) and GSE154918 (adults).

fig.attrib: Abbreviations: AUC, area under the receiver operating characteristic curve; GSVA, gene set variation analysis; PPI, protein-protein interaction; STEM, short time-series expression miner; WGCNA, weighted gene coexpression network analysis.
